catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 570
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: mask of male face with large nose, round eyes with carved out eyeholes; narrow grin with top teeth visible; wrinkles in forehead; holes drilled into eyebrows, moustache, and chin possibly once for hair
title: Noh Mask of a Man
